chrome_extension_description.message: A tool import CSV file into Plickers website (enabled in Plickers website)

popup_caption.message: Click the button and select CSV file to import.

browser_action_title.message:
Plickers Import

1.sign in Plickers website 

2.click this popup icon 

3.select CSV file 

4.select the columns to import 

5.click submit to import data

sign_in_first.message:
Sign in first

1. Sign in Plickers website.

2. Select the CSV file to import.

file_read_error.message: import failure, the file read error.

imported_to_set.message: Questions were imported to the new SET :

imported_to_folder.message: Questions were imported to the new folder :

page_reload.message: Reload this page to show the result. ( auto reload in 5 seconds )
